collection_holder_name: Department of Special Collections, University of California at Los Angeles (UCLA)
pageContext.collection_title: Hale Sparks: "The University Explorer" Oral History Transcript
pageContext.collection_description: Sparks discusses the history of radio programming at the University and his activities with the Office of War Information during World War II. Includes a discussion of the University Explorer, Science Editor and Master Storytellers in the Modern World programs.
